pageContent: Aims: One of the current limitations of reports issued by the New Zealand Cancer Registry (NZCR) is that the only measure of the success of treatment is provided by the mortality ratio. A pilot study was therefore carried out to see if collaboration between cancer centres and the NZCR might allow the generation of more meaningful survival data that could be used for the audit of treatment outcome.

metaData.source:
Defining an international research agenda for quality of life in men with prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/10440876/
